metquayappurl.description: Metquay application URL(change this to your application URL)

info.description:
Enterprise CRUD API for managing Metquay calibration management system entities.
Provides complete CRUD operations for customers, instrument categories, customer instruments, and works.

## Authentication Flow
1. Call `/authenticate` with your access/secret keys
2. Receive Bearer token (valid for 15 minutes)
3. Include token in `Authorization: Bearer {token}` header for all subsequent requests
4. Re-authenticate when token expires

## Rate Limiting
- **100 requests per minute** per API client
- Exceeding limit returns 429 Too Many Requests
- Contact support for rate limit increases

## Idempotency
- PUT and DELETE operations are idempotent (safe to retry)
- POST operations are NOT idempotent (retry may create duplicates)

## Pagination
- List endpoints support pagination via `first` and `limit` query parameters
- `first`: Starting index (default: 0, minimum: 0)
- `limit`: Number of records to return (default: 50)

## Workspace Feature
- `workspaceCode` is optional and only required if the workspace feature is enabled for your organization
- If workspace feature is not enabled, omit this parameter
info.title: Metquay CRUD API

tags.name: authenticate
tags.description: Authentication operations - obtain and manage access tokens

tags.name: instrumentcategories
tags.description: Instrument category management (classify instruments by type)

post.description:
Authenticates client application using pre-provisioned access/secret keys.

**Token Expiry:** 15 minutes (900 seconds)
**Rate Limit:** Not applied to this endpoint

**Headers Required in Subsequent Calls:**
`Authorization: Bearer {accessToken}`

Creates a new customer record. Customers own calibration instruments.

**Auto-generation:** `companyCode` auto-generated if not provided
**Uniqueness:** `companyName` must be unique
**Default Address:** Billing address = Primary = Certificate address

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of customers.

**Pagination:**
- Use `first` and `limit` to control result set

**Workspace:**
- `workspaceCode` is optional - only include if workspace feature is enabled

parameters.name: workspaceCode
parameters.description: Workspace code (optional - only required if workspace feature is enabled)

put.description:
Updates an existing customer record.

**Full Replacement:** All fields not included in request will be reset to null/default
**Immutable Fields:** `companyCode` cannot be modified after creation
**Type Change:** Cannot change `isPerson` (company/individual) after creation

delete.description:
Permanently deletes a customer record.

**Restrictions - Cannot delete if customer has:**
- Any associated instruments
- Any active or historical works

**Alternative:** Set `isInactive: true` instead of deleting

post.description:
Creates a new instrument category.

**Uniqueness:** Category `name` must be globally unique (case-insensitive)
**Dependency:** Cannot delete categories with associated instruments

put.description:
Updates an existing instrument category.

**Restriction:** Cannot update if category has associated instruments
**Workaround:** 
1. Reassign instruments to different category
2. Update category name
3. Reassign instruments back

delete.description:
Permanently deletes an instrument category.

**Required:** No instruments can be assigned to this category
**Action:** Reassign or delete all instruments in this category first

post.description:
Registers a new instrument owned by a customer.

**Required References:**
- Existing customer (`companyId`)
- Existing instrument category (`instrumentCategoryName`)

**Calibration Scheduling:**
If `calibrationFrequency` + `calibrationFrequencySpan` provided:
- `dueDate` auto-calculated from `calibratedDate` (defaults to creation date)

**Uniqueness:** Serial/Tag number combinations should be unique per customer

get.summary: Get paginated list of customer instruments
get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of customer instruments.

**Pagination:**
- Use `first` and `limit` to control result set

**Workspace:**
- `workspaceCode` is optional - only include if workspace feature is enabled

parameters.name: workspaceCode
parameters.description: Workspace code (optional - only required if workspace feature is enabled)

put.description:
Updates an existing customer instrument.

**Full Replacement:** All fields not included are reset
**Ownership Change:** Changing `companyId` transfers instrument to another customer
**Category Change:** May affect calibration procedures and pricing

delete.description:
Permanently deletes a customer instrument.

**Restrictions - Cannot delete if instrument has:**
- Any associated works (active or historical)
- Any child instruments (parentInstrumentId references this instrument)

**Alternative:** Set `isActive: false` instead of deleting

post.description:
Creates a calibration, testing, or evaluation work.

**Work Types (`workFlowType`):**
- `Calibration`: Adjust and verify accuracy (default)
- `Testing`: Verify performance without adjustment
- `Evaluation`: Assess condition and recommend actions

**Auto-numbering:** `workNo` auto-generated if not provided
**Required Reference:** Existing customer instrument (`customerInstrumentId`)

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of works.

**Pagination:**
- Use `first` and `limit` to control result set

**Workspace:**
- `workspaceCode` is optional - only include if workspace feature is enabled

parameters.name: workspaceCode
parameters.description: Workspace code (optional - only required if workspace feature is enabled)

put.description:
Updates an existing work.

**Immutable Fields:** `workNo` cannot be changed
**Status Restriction:** Cannot modify completed or cancelled works
**Reassignment:** Changing `customerInstrumentId` reassigns work to different instrument

bearerAuth.description:
Token valid for 15 minutes.
Header format: `Authorization: Bearer {accessToken}`

MetquayId.name: metquayId
MetquayId.description: Numeric ID of the resource in Metquay system

example.message: The request contains invalid fields or missing required parameters
Invalid or expired access token. Please re-authenticate.
You don't have permission to access this resource

404.description: Not found - resource does not exist

example.message: The requested resource with ID 10427 does not exist
Resource cannot be saved because it violates unique constraints. A customer with this company code already exists.
Cannot process request since one or more validation failed. Company name is required.

429.description: Too Many Requests - rate limit exceeded (100/minute)

example.message: API rate limit of 100 requests per minute exceeded. Please try again in 30 seconds.
An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified. Reference ID: ERR-12345-67890

CustomerRequest.description: Request payload for creating or updating a customer

parentCompanyCode.description: Parent company code (if this customer is a subsidiary)

companyCode.description: Unique identifier for the customer. Auto-generated if not provided.

isInactive.description: Customer status - false for active, true for inactive

companyName.description: Legal name of the customer organization

workspaceCode.description: Workspace code (required only if workspace feature is enabled)

hasBillingAddress.description: Indicates if customer has a billing address

hasShippingAddress.description: Indicates if customer has a shipping address

customerSpecificRequirements.example: All deliveries require forklift access and must be scheduled 24 hours in advance. Contact warehouse manager at ext. 4500.
customerSpecificRequirements.description: Customer specific delivery or service requirements

notes.example: Premium support customer since 2018. Monthly calibration volume averages 50-75 instruments. Primary contact: John Smith (john.smith@metquay.com)

shortName.description: Short name or alias for display purposes

isTaxable.description: Indicates if customer is subject to tax

taxCode.description: Tax exemption code or tax ID

name.description: Instrument category name - must be unique across the system

description.example: Electronic test equipment used to measure voltage, current, and resistance. Includes both benchtop and handheld models.

complianceRequired.description: true if regulatory compliance verification is required

customerSpecificRequirements.example: Calibration required at 5 specific points: -20C, 0C, 25C, 50C, 80C. Certificate must include measurement uncertainty at 95% confidence level.

subConDetails.example: High-voltage calibration subcontracted to PowerCal Labs. Expected return date: 01-26-2024. Subcontractor PO #PO-2024-8910.
